source_refs.snippet: I hereby certify that ACME TRADING PRIVATE LIMITED is this day incorporated under the Companies Act, 2013 and that the company is limited.

main_objectives_raw.value: To carry on the business of trading, buying, selling, importing, exporting, manufacturing, processing, dealing in all types of chemicals, pharmaceuticals, industrial raw materials, finished goods, and allied products. To carry on business as traders, distributors, stockists, dealers, agents, brokers, commission agents, and to enter into agreements with manufacturers and suppliers.
